data.name: Odd or Even (complicated)
data.description:
In this kata you must check whether the given number is odd or even. 

If the number is odd and not pallindrome :Then you have to return that number in  a reverse order 
      eg: number =123 then return 321
            
If the number is even and not pallindrome:Then you must return that given number added  to that number  in the reverse order:
eg: number=124 then return 545

If that number is odd and pallindrome:Then you have to return that number to the power of the first digit of the number
      eg: number=121 then return 121

If that number is even and pallindrome:Then you have to return that number multiplied by itself
      eg if number =212 then return 44944
